snippet.title: The Making of Karateka  - Official Announcement Trailer | ID@Xbox Showcase
snippet.description:
Get a behind-the-scenes look at The Making of Karateka in this trailer for the martial arts action game from developer Jordan Mechner. Karateka is a 1984 martial arts action game created for the Apple II, and inspired by Japanese culture (Ukiyo-e art, Akira Kurosawa films, and manga comics) and by early Disney animated films and silent pictures. The Making of Karateka, which will feature four playable versions, including an all-new remaster, is coming to Xbox One and Xbox Series X/S, as well as on Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, and PC (Steam, GOG, and Epic Store). A simultaneous release on all platforms is expected later this summer.

#IGN #Gaming #Xbox
